---
title: "Make meta data table for released shotgun samples"
output: html_document
date: "2025-11-11"
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```
```{r}
meta <- read_csv('../data/153_combined_META.csv')

sra <- read_tsv('../data/metadata-15667504-processed-ok.tsv')

shotgun_released <- sra |> 
  rename(sampleid = library_ID) |> 
  inner_join(meta |> select(sampleid, pid, sdrt )) |> 
  select(sampleid, pid, sdrt, accession, bioproject_accession, biosample_accession, filename:filename4)  

shotgun_released |> write_csv('../data/R52_shotgun_released_333_meta.csv')
```
